1 week ago - Coupang was headquartered in Songpa District, Seoul, South Korea until 2022 when it relocated to Seattle in the US. The Seattle office opened in 2018 and grew to 350 employees within four years. Coupang also has offices in Beijing, Shanghai, Los Angeles and Mountain View.
